original_title: Flight of Faith: The Jesus Story
overview: Faith & Spirituality, Faith & Spirituality Documentaries, Inspirational Stories - Using the chronology in the New Testament as a guide and shot in stunning high definition, this film traces the path of Jesus's life through the Holy Land, following in his footsteps as the gospels and his legacy are discussed. You'll see spectacular vistas from Nazareth to Jerusalem, including the Mount of the Beatitudes, where Jesus delivered his stirring sermon. Also featured are Cana and Bethsaida, the sites of miracles performed by Christ.
title: Flight of Faith: The Jesus Story
